casebody.data:
No. 69323 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 15, 2018

BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., successor by merger to BAC Home Loans Servicing, LP, f/k/a Countrywide Home Loans Servicing, LP, a National Association, Appellant,
v.
SFR INVESTMENTS POOL 1, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Respondent.

AFFIRMED.
